PlaybackControlLayer.FullscreenCallback - Interface in com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo
In order to imbue the PlaybackControlLayer with the ability make the player fullscreen, a PlaybackControlLayer.FullscreenCallback must be assigned to it.
PlaybackControlLayer.MessageHandler - Class in com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo
Message handler which allows us to send delayed messages to the PlaybackControlLayer This is useful for fading out the view after a certain time.
